EmailTemplate.name: Stickers Ready To Send
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in YETI and for reaching out to us!
We will gladly get some stickers sent your way! Please keep an eye on your mail as these will be there in 7-15 business days.
Thank you,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
